metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0373 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The gen_class_pod implementation in lib/Config/Model/Utils/GenClassPod.pm in Config-Model (aka libconfig-model-perl) before 2.102 has a dangerous "use lib" line, which allows remote attackers to have an unspecified impact via a crafted Debian package file.

criterions.comment: libconfig-model-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
